main.value:
{
    "caption": "Author",
    "name": "author_id",
    "description": "Select the author of this article. He or she must be a MODX user.",
    "type": "listbox",
    "inputOptionValues": "@SELECT '' AS username, '' AS id UNION ALL ( SELECT username, id FROM `modx_users` ORDER BY username )",
    "category": "About",
    "sortOrder": "1",
    "templates": [
        "ArticleTraditional",
        "ArticleReadability",
        "ArticleSidenotes",
        "Article - Traditional",
        "Article - Readability",
        "Article - Sidenotes"
    ]
}

{
    "caption": "Comments",
    "name": "comments_toggle",
    "description": "Enable or disable comments.",
    "type": "option",
    "inputOptionValues": "Active==1||Disabled==0",
    "category": "Comments",
    "sortOrder": "1",
    "templates": [
        "ArticleTraditional",
        "ArticleReadability",
        "ArticleSidenotes",
        "Article - Traditional",
        "Article - Readability",
        "Article - Sidenotes"
    ]
}
